page.title: 17SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: {GRASSLAND RESEARCH INSTITUTE A large research facility sited at North Wyke and East Rowden Moor. The main aim of the research is to increase the efficiency of animal production on all grassland farms. Work is being carried out in three main areas. {1.The improvement of existing {permanent grass sward. {2.The use of white clover. {3.The efficiency of grassland {utilization in wet conditions. The{G.R.I.'s}farm extends to 250ha which are entirely devoted to research.There is a herd of approx 100 dairy cattle, 360 HerefordXFresian steers of various ages and 400 sheep.
